Package jmines.control.actions.robot

This package contains all the action objects used to construct the robot menu of the main frame menu bar.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Cheat The class representing the action used when the user click the Cheat menu item.
Help The class representing the action used when the user click the Help menu item.
Name The class representing the action used when the user click the Name menu item.
Play The class representing the action used when the user click the Cheat menu item.
RandomTries The class representing the action used when the user click the random tries menu item.
RealClicks The class representing the action used when the user click the Real clicks menu item.
Statistics The class representing the action used when the user click the Statistics Robot menu item.
 

Package jmines.control.actions.robot Description

This package contains all the action objects used to construct the robot menu of the main frame menu bar.
